#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define gc getchar
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define ll long long
#define MOD 1000000007
#define inf 2000000000
#define oo (ll)1e18
#define TRACE
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(0); 
 
#ifdef TRACE
 #define trace(x)            cerr<<x<<endl;
    #define trace1(x)           cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#x" = "<<x<<endl;
    #define trace2(x,y)         cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#x" = "<<x<<" | "#y" = "<<y<<endl;
    #define trace3(x,y,z)       cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#x" = "<<x<<" | "#y" = "<<y<<" | "#z" = "<<z<<endl;
    #define trace4(a,b,c,d)     cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#a" = "<<a<<" | "#b" = "<<b<<" | "#c" = "<<c<<" | "#d" = "<<d<<endl;
    #define trace5(a,b,c,d,e)   cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#a" = "<<a<<" | "#b" = "<<b<<" | "#c" = "<<c<<" | "#d" = "<<d<<" | "#e" = "<<e<<endl;
    #define trace6(a,b,c,d,e,f) cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#a" = "<<a<<" | "#b" = "<<b<<" | "#c" = "<<c<<" | "#d" = "<<d<<" | "#e" = "<<e<<" | "#f" = "<<f<<endl;
 
#else
 
#define trace1(x)
#define trace2(x, y)
#define trace3(x, y, z)
#define trace4(a, b, c, d)
#define trace5(a, b, c, d, e)
#define trace6(a, b, c, d, e, f)
 
#endif
  
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;

void scan(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}
const int M=1000005;
char s[2][M];
int pi[1][M],z[2*M];

void prefix(int idx){
	int k=0,n=strlen(s[0]+1);
	pi[idx][1]=0;
	for(int i=2;i<=n;i++){
		while(k!=0&&s[idx][i]!=s[idx][k+1]){
			k=pi[idx][k];
		}
		if(s[idx][k+1]==s[idx][i])
		k++;
		pi[idx][i]=k;
	}
}

void zfunc(){
	string x(s[1]+1),y(s[0]+1);
	x+='@';
	x+=y;
	//cout<<x<<endl;
	int l=0,r=0,n=x.length();
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
		z[i]=0;
		if(i<=r)
		z[i]=min(z[i-l],r-i+1);
		while(i+z[i]<n&&x[i+z[i]]==x[z[i]])
		z[i]++;
		if(i+z[i]-1>r)
		l=i,r=i+z[i]-1;
		//trace2(i,z[i]);
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	z[i]=z[y.length()+i];
}

void solve(){
	scanf("%s",s[0]+1);
	scanf("%s",s[1]+1);
	int n=strlen(s[0]+1),k;
	prefix(0);	
	zfunc();
	k=0;
	int ans=0;
	
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
		while(k!=0&&s[1][i]!=s[0][k+1]){
			k=pi[0][k];
		}
		if(s[1][i]==s[0][k+1])
		k++;
		if(k==i||z[k+1]>=i-k)
		ans=i;
		//trace4(i,k,i-k,match[i]);
	}
	printf("%d\n",ans);
}
int main(){
    //freopen("inp.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
    int t,tt=1;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){	
		printf("Case %d: ",tt++);
		solve();
	}
    return 0;
}
